content: the lazy red panda pattern was inspired by red pandas sleeping or hanging out on tree branches have fun making a panda plushie that can laze around your home too this pattern is recommended for the advanced beginner or intermediate crocheter as it involves sewing and colour changing materials yarn rust brown dark brown white black and light pink i used weight 4 red heart super savers 3 5 mm crochet hook 10 mm safety eyes scissors polyester filling for stuffing tapestry needle for sewing stitch markers optional glue optional used as an alternative to sewing on face patches and eyebrows finished size using these materials is 9 inches 13 inches with tail stretched out if you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me via instagram at @babymoocrochet
